hooks.command: file="$TOOL_INPUT_FILE_PATH"; if [[ "$file" == *.tmp ]] || [[ "$file" == *.temp ]] || [[ "$file" == debug_* ]] || [[ "$file" == test_* ]] || [[ "$file" == *progress.md ]]; then echo "⚠️  Warning: Temporary file created: $file. Remember to clean up before commit."; fi

file="$TOOL_INPUT_FILE_PATH"; if [[ "$file" == *.tmp ]] || [[ "$file" == *.temp ]] || [[ "$file" == debug_* ]] || [[ "$file" == test_* ]] || [[ "$file" == *progress.md ]]; then echo "⚠️  Warning: Temporary file modified: $file. Remember to clean up before commit."; fi

cmd="$TOOL_INPUT_COMMAND"; if [[ "$cmd" == *"git add"* ]] || [[ "$cmd" == *"git commit"* ]]; then temp_files=$(find /app/workspace -type f \( -name '*.tmp' -o -name '*.temp' -o -name 'debug_*' -o -name 'test_*' -o -name 'progress.md' \) 2>/dev/null | wc -l | tr -d ' '); if [ "$temp_files" -gt 0 ]; then echo "❌ BLOCKED: Found $temp_files temporary file(s). Clean up before commit:"; find /app/workspace -type f \( -name '*.tmp' -o -name '*.temp' -o -name 'debug_*' -o -name 'test_*' -o -name 'progress.md' \) 2>/dev/null; echo ""; echo "Run: rm -f /app/workspace/{*.tmp,*.temp,debug_*,test_*,progress.md}"; exit 1; fi; fi
